ca.mcgill.hs.prefs
Class HSAndroidPreferences

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  android.app.ListActivity
                      android.preference.PreferenceActivity
                          ca.mcgill.hs.prefs.HSAndroidPreferences
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class HSAndroidPreferences
extends android.preference.PreferenceActivity

HSAndroidPreferences is a class extending PreferenceActivity which defines the settings menu for the HSAndroid Activity. Whenever the user accesses the settings from the options menu, this PreferenceActivity is launched.
